body: ACK apart from the nits, these kind of details can be useful when trying to find out why a certain parameter ended up at a certain value.
Fixed nits, thanks for your feedback.

Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/df966d1b24a5cde06625906c4f1b72f393d9d133 for binaries and test log.
This test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/current/
Contact BlueMatt on freenode if something looks broken.
I'd say "-listen=0 -> setting -upnp=0" here. "unset" (in the above messages) implies that the parameter is not set at all, while it checks here that it's set to 0.
